name: Medium Job Potion
description: The potion helps increase a certain amount of Job EXP.

name: Medium JOB Potion
description: An ordinary-looking potion. After drinking it, Players can stimulate the potentials inside. Although it tastes strange, it can increase adventurer's JOB EXP by 10000 points. Sometimes a "L" pattern can be found at the bottom of the bottle.

name: Medium Level Potion
description: The potion helps increase a certain amount of Base EXP.

name: Melody Winder
description: Twist once, you can hear a musical; twist twice, you can dance with the walz; twist third time, you can sing along with it.

name: Melon Cat
description: The faint scent of mosquito-repellent incense and the tinkling of aeolian bells fills the air of a summer evening. Every kid could use a watermelon right about now~ (Designed by: 谁花彦)

name: Melon Cat Blueprint
description: Mosquito-repellent incense drifted in the summer night, while wind chimes rang by the night wind. Watermelon is children's favorite at this time.

name: Melting Ice Cream
description: Every time I put it on, I recalled the summer when we eat ice cream and waited for Summer Test. After eating ice cream, You can see "2016 Summer" on the wooden stick.

name: Melting Ice Cream [1]
description: Every time I put it on, I recalled the summer when we eat ice cream and waited for Summer Test. After eating ice cream, You can see "RO 2016 Summer" on the wooden stick.

name: Memento
description: Treasures that go with the dead to the netherworld, mostly of quite a high value. I wonder what you can make with them?

name: Memory Book
description: The magic book used by Mages, large and heavy enough to serve as a shield.

name: Memory Book [1]
description: The magic book used by Mages, large and heavy enough to serve as a shield.

name: Memory Gem
description: It seems that times stopped in the crystal. You can find other's memory inside it. But who's that guy?

name: Mercenary Armor
description: The iron armor for mercenaries, adapting to a variety of complex conditions.

name: Mercenary Armor [1]
description: The iron armor for mercenaries, adapting to a variety of complex conditions.

name: Mercenary Bow
description: A long bow specially made for mercenaries. Adapt to a variety of complex environments.

name: Mercenary Bow [2]
description: A long bow specially made for mercenaries. Adapt to a variety of complex environments.

name: Mercenary Coat
description: The heavy coat for mercenaries, adapting to a variety of complex conditions.

name: Mercenary Coat [1]
description: The heavy coat for mercenaries, adapting to a variety of complex conditions.

name: Mercenary Hammer
description: A fighting hammer specially made for mercenaries. Adapt to a variety of complex environments.
